description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Have you even dreamt of moving up? I don't mean in an existential way, or in your career. When playing a block game did you ever want to move up? Incessant blocks always moving down, why won't they just go up.  Now you are probably thinking, "Wait, I can move blocks up in a lot of games." Go ahead, I will give you some time...  Welcome to the 2nd dimension of the 2nd dimension.
